name: places/ChIJ5RyhwRlZwokRqCNDG0fv0-U
adrFormatAddress: 1000 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Luxury brand known for signature monogrammed handbags, luggage & more.

originalText.text: We visited NYC in early September and ordered a bag at Louis Vuitton at Bloomingdales. I received an email stating the handbag is in the 59th store.....10 days ago. After multiple emails and phone calls to/from Louis Vuitton, no one seems to know why this has not been shipped. I have stated that Simon sold the bag, he was told to ship it, and he should follow through. I cannot reach out to customer service at Bloomingdale's because there is no direct number to customer service or to this department. I see the rating is a 3. At this point, that is quite generous.

originalText.text: The Asian guy servicing fragrances in the womenâ€™s section lied straight to my face. I went in asking for 3 specific samples to try planning to return on Friday once I make my decision. originalText.text:
I ordered the coin purse with Hot stamping at the store 2 weeks ago. I requested to be shipped it home. They didn't. I got there to pick it up today. When I saw the coin purse, they didn't do Hot stamping also. I requested a refund. They made me waste my time.
I don't trust them anymore and go to buy anything. I was supposed to give them 0 stars.

originalText.text: The staff always makes you feel welcomed and are super friendly and helpful. Especially if youâ€™re a regular. They arenâ€™t as judgmental on how you look which is rare at Bloomingdaleâ€™s. Best part is that you get Loyallist points for every purchase here.

originalText.text: Awful customer service. Attendant and I stress this with the most honesty was just not friendly hung up on me when I asked if they had the Lv moon square sunglasses. Not even knowledgeable enough to know the name of what they had so I told her one moment bc she asked me for the style number and I had to google it from the LV ONLINE WEBSITE. Just awful I was deterred from even wanting to go there after all.
